about_the_game: Beglov Style is set in an impoverished town, where players take on the role of various people driven to despair. Players will have to face chilling horror as they uncover the secrets of the small town and search for the source of evil. Get ready for exciting and intense gameplay.
detailed_description: Beglov Style is set in an impoverished town, where players take on the role of various people driven to despair.
